@usedefault
{{html:
     <h1>Buckets List</h1>
     <a href="/$$space/new_bucket" class="btn btn-info btn-large btnfull">
      Create Bucket
     </a>
    <table   class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <tr>
     <th>
      Image
     </th>
     <th>
      Name
     </th>
     <th>
      Status
     </th>
     <th>
      Plan
     </th>
     <th>
      Region
     </th>
    </tr>
     <tbody data-bind="foreach: buckets">
      <tr>
       <td data-bind="text: imageName">
       </td>
       <td data-bind="title: name">
        <a data-bind="text: name, attr: {href: bucketUrl}"></a>
       </td>
       <td data-bind="text: status">
       </td>
       <td data-bind="text: plan">
       </td>
       <td data-bind="text: region">
       </td>
      </tr>
     </tbody>
    </table>
}}
